skills.skill: Craft Beer/Seltzer and CPG Industry Knowledge

duties_responsibilities.duty: Collect and analyze data from all facets of the business to create useful intelligence and provide insightful reporting for management.
Create dashboards through Tableau for use by sales, marketing, finance & logistics teams.
Assist Sales teams in identifying sales opportunities through various analytical tools & methods.
Perform ad hoc analysis and provide necessary analytics to drive strategic, operational, financial, and tactical decision making.
Analyze competitive data through Nielsen/IRI to identify market trends and track the competitive landscape.
Assist in the creation of forecasts & budgets for the sales team and in the management of the pricing process through in-house systems.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Business, Analytics, or a related field (Master's preferred)
